metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9619 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason: This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed that it was not a security issue. Notes: none.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> change is too intrusive for stable releases

criterions.comment: systemd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
